snippet.title: Let's MEAT Adam 2 : Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
LMA2 is a Gay Bara Horror Visual Novel, with murder mystery and puzzle elements; the sequel to 2017's "Let's MEAT Adam". It will be available for PC, Mac, and possibly Android in future (depending on scope/user demand).

It'll be available on our website ( https://soulsoftea.itch.io/ ). Join discussions on our Twitter ( https://twitter.com/SoulsoftEA ) and/or the official Lemmasoft Forum post.
